response.original_title: デリシャスボディガール・瞳超高級食パンのセクシーディナーを召し上がれ
response.overview: Hitomi and Akito are unable to get married due to their parents' hostile relationship, dividing the small shopping district in two. They each try to convince their parents by creating the ultimate bread and the ultimate chicken nanban, but it doesn't go well and they just devour each other's bodies every night... Then, Hitomi meets Hiroaki, the heir to a major food company. His passionate proposal makes her heart waver, and the bond between Hitomi and Akito, caught between dreams and lust, is now in its biggest crisis yet...!
response.title: Delicious Body Hitomi: Sexy Dinner with Super High-quality Bread

titles.title: Derishasubodigāru hitomi chōkōkyū shokupan no sekushīdinā o meshiagare
